title: Project Scoping - Network Audit
description: A client requests a project to perform a comprehensive audit of their network infrastructure and provide recommendations.

tasks.description: Hold a discovery call to understand the size of the network (number of sites, switches, firewalls) and the specific goals of the audit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The consultant understands the scope and objectives.

tasks.description: Create a detailed Statement of Work (SOW) that outlines the audit methodology, the specific areas to be reviewed, and the format of the final deliverable report.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear and comprehensive SOW is created.

tasks.description: Provide a fixed-fee quote for the audit project.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client receives a quote for the work.
